comments.content:
Looks like an enhanced Clarendon Black [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/clarendon/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140319225631/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/clarendon/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/clarendon/")  
Don

Weird nobody can't find a match for this one. Very Clarendon Extended/Wide Black without being totally it: /J tail, transition stems/slab serifs, /K leg internal serif... May be giving more details on this one like the origin could help finding a better match...

Thanks for the responses. It came from a clipart that I bought and I contact the designer of the art which is why I want to post it here - below is the link to the picture..

[http://www.dreamstime.com/royalty-free-stock-photography-slot-machine-sh...](http://web.archive.org/web/20140319225631/http:/www.dreamstime.com/royalty-free-stock-photography-slot-machine-shiny-background-image23755067 "http://www.dreamstime.com/royalty-free-stock-photography-slot-machine-shiny-background-image23755067")
